sigma::core::CallbackInterfaceBase Class Referenceabstract

Abstract base class that CallbackInterface derives from. More...

Protected Member Functions

virtual void unregister_function (chaos::uint32 id)=0
 

Friends

class ScopedCallback
 

Detailed Description

Abstract base class that CallbackInterface derives from.

This is used so that ScopedCallbacks can hold a pointer to CallbackInterfaces without needing to know their template type.
